verses.name: Ezekiel 24:7
verses.text: For her blood is in the midst of her; she set it upon the top of a rock; she poured it not upon the ground, to cover it with dust;

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:8
verses.text: That it might cause fury to come up to take vengeance; I have set her blood upon the top of a rock, that it should not be covered.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:9
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Woe to the bloody city! I will even make the pile for fire great.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:10
verses.text: Heap on wood, kindle the fire, consume the flesh, and spice it well, and let the bones be burned.
